badges.label: Open Data
badges.description: Underlying dataset (NASA GISTEMP, NOAA, HadCRUT) is openly available for download and verification.

badges.label: Baseline Period
badges.description: Temperature anomalies are calculated relative to the 1850-1900 average, which serves as the pre-industrial baseline.

badges.label: Multiple Datasets
badges.description: Results are based on multiple independent temperature datasets to ensure robustness and reduce uncertainty.

badges.label: Global Coverage
badges.description: Data represents global surface temperature averages, combining land and ocean measurements worldwide.

badges.label: Anomaly Calculation
badges.description: Shows temperature anomalies (departures from baseline) rather than absolute temperatures to highlight changes over time.

badges.label: Recent Warming Trend
badges.description: Clear acceleration in warming since the 1980s, with the most recent years showing unprecedented temperature anomalies.

badges.label: Monthly Variability
badges.description: Monthly data shows natural seasonal variations, but recent years consistently exceed historical ranges.

badges.label: Color-Coded Scale
badges.description: Color gradient from blue (cooler) to red (warmer) helps visualize the warming trend over time.
